sentences.english: And they preferred hunger and famine to the desecration of the ancestral grave…
sentences.chinese: 他们宁可自己忍饥挨饿也不愿亵渎祖先们的坟茔。

sentences.english: It is the ancestor of karate and ju-jitsu.
sentences.chinese: 功夫起源于中国，是空手道和柔术的祖先。

sentences.english: The Boskops coexisted with our Homo sapiens forebears.
sentences.chinese: 博斯科普人曾与我们的智人祖先和平共处。

sentences.english: Songshan is one of the first-inhabited area of Chinese ancestors.
sentences.chinese: 嵩山是中国祖先最早居住的地区之一。

sentences.english: Our Stone Age ancestors certainly did not live in a feedlot.
sentences.chinese: 我们石器时代的祖先当然没有生活在饲养场。

sentences.english: Our closest relatives straightened their backs and began walking upright on two legs.
sentences.chinese: 人类的祖先伸直了后肢开始直立行走。

sentences.english: My ancestors came from Switzerland in 1742…
sentences.chinese: 我的祖先在1742年从瑞士迁来。

sentences.english: His forefather was abducted to America two centuries ago.
sentences.chinese: 他的祖先是两百年前被绑架到美洲的。

sentences.english: No one can stop what our fathers and forefathers have done for thousands of years.
sentences.chinese: 没有人能够阻止我们父亲和祖先在几千年前所做的。

sentences.english: The common-ancestral selves were unicellular, whereas the animal lineage has elected to construct multicellular selves.
sentences.chinese: 祖先本身是单细胞的，然而动物进化成多细胞。

sentences.english: People with a common ancestry, however, tend to have similar collections of SNPs (pronounced "snips").
sentences.chinese: 但是，有相同祖先的人倾向于拥有相似的SNPs。

sentences.english: Our Chinese ancestors came across the ocean, sailing south to find a way for living.
sentences.chinese: 我们的族祖先飘洋过海，下南洋讨生活。

sentences.english: that he invited his guests to join him in the Hall of Ancestors.
sentences.chinese: 甚至请他的客人跟他一块到祖先的灵堂里去。

sentences.english: By the term human sacrifice, we mean executing people and afterwards interring them in a pit in order to worship the ancestors.
sentences.chinese: 把人强行处死后埋入坑内祭祀祖先，称为人祭。

sentences.english: McCain's family tree includes Scots-Irish and English ancestors.
sentences.chinese: 麦凯恩的族谱，包括苏格兰，爱尔兰和英国的祖先。

sentences.english: According to the archives, our Chinese ancestors began using stilts to help them gather fruits from trees.
sentences.chinese: 根据记载，我们的祖先踩高跷是为了从树上摘果子。

definition: primogenitor/founder of a school or trade
